Projects.name: EvEMarketBot
details: Developed and maintained a basic program to manage market orders in the popular MMO EVE Online
This tool has been sucessfully deployed with many users, who can easily keep track of prices by using simple, easy to understand commands.

This tool uses data from multiple APIs and is capable of comparing data between many locations in the game. The owner of the bot can aslo keep track of who is using it, allowing them to see popular items, as well as banning any user who might abuse the bot
I am still working with the community that has access to this project to improve upon it through their suggestions.
